trans-unit.source: Filters displayed data to a specific time period only.

seg-source.mrk: Filters displayed data to a specific time period only.

target.mrk: 仅将显示的数据过滤到特定时间期间。

trans-unit.source: The time period defined in the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> field filters the data displayed subsequently for analysis in the <uicontrol>Characteristic Value Combinations</uicontrol> list. The list displays those characteristic value combinations which have at least one period intersecting the period range.

seg-source.mrk: The time period defined in the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> field filters the data displayed subsequently for analysis in the <uicontrol>Characteristic Value Combinations</uicontrol> list.
The list displays those characteristic value combinations which have at least one period intersecting the period range.

target.mrk: 在<uicontrol>期间范围</uicontrol>字段中定义的时间期间会过滤随后在<uicontrol>特征值组合</uicontrol>列表中为分析而显示的数据。
该清单显示至少有一个期间与该期间范围相交的特征值组合。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can use the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> selection on the <uicontrol>Characteristic Value Combination</uicontrol> screen to define a differing time period for displaying product allocation period data than selected on the <uicontrol>Monitor Product Allocation Characteristic Value Combinations</uicontrol> screen. Data is displayed for those period entries whose start or end dates intersect with the defined period range. If no period range is defined, the start date of the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> selection defaults to the current date.

seg-source.mrk: Note that you can use the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> selection on the <uicontrol>Characteristic Value Combination</uicontrol> screen to define a differing time period for displaying product allocation period data than selected on the <uicontrol>Monitor Product Allocation Characteristic Value Combinations</uicontrol> screen.
Data is displayed for those period entries whose start or end dates intersect with the defined period range.
If no period range is defined, the start date of the <uicontrol>Period Range</uicontrol> selection defaults to the current date.

target.mrk: 请注意，可以使用<uicontrol>特征值组合</uicontrol>屏幕上<uicontrol>期间范围</uicontrol>选择定义用于显示产品分配期间数据的时间段，该时间段与在<uicontrol>监控产品分配特征值组合</uicontrol>屏幕上选择的时间段不同。
针对开始或结束日期与定义的期间范围相交的期间条目显示数据。
如果未定义期间范围，则<uicontrol>期间范围</uicontrol>选择的开始日期缺省为当前日期。
